Summary: Driving home and saw a really mean looking cloud. Had camera and decided to photograph. Took shoot of the clouds as a storm was rolling in. One while driving and the other when I stop at a light. Was suprised to see such a thing on only the two photos
divs: Sighting DetailsPulling up to the intersection of 360 and Route 129. At Ernie's Resturant. I wanted to take a picture of the clouds as the storm was rolling in. I did not see object until I downloaded to the computer. Thought it looked strange.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in South Boston
There were no other sightings in South Boston on or around April 4th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
